DOC.brief_summary: This study determine whether metabolic cellular mechanism contribute improved insulin action aerobic resistive exercise different old , obese , insulin resistant veteran . The hypothesis regular exercise , whether aerobic resistive , improve whole body insulin action , nature magnitude change skeletal muscle differ two type exercise .
DOC.brief_title: Aging Cellular Mechanism Insulin Action After Exercise Training
DOC.detailed_description: Veterans comparable body composition age , randomly assign either aerobic resistive exercise . They instruct weight maintenance diet prior beginning exercise program , maintain diet throughout study . Metabolic test perform baseline 6 month exercise train . Testing include measurement body composition ( anthropometry , dual-energy Xray absorptiometry , compute tomograph scan ) , maximal oxygen consumption , muscle strength , glucose tolerance ( oral glucose tolerance test ) , insulin sensitivity ( euglycemic-hyperinsulinemic clamp ) , muscle biopsy examine skeletal muscle metabolic characteristic ( fiber type distribution , capillary density , oxidative glycolytic enzyme activity , level key protein important insulin signal glucose transport ) . Data analyze use analysis variance determine difference two exercise group , multiple regression analysis determine primary adaptation associate improvement whole body insulin action .
DOC.criteria: Males 50 year 80 year Overweight Nonsmoker Sedentary ( regular exercise one year )
